result.title: Report on the monitoring protocols and evaluation of the 1st monitoring period (preconstruction)
result.description: Report on the already existing monitoring protocols, both at EU and international level. Based on the appropriate protocol selection the monitoring parameters will be set and the results of these parameters performances will be presented, in the preconstruction phase. Their performance will be recorded, evaluated and assessed for 15 months.
